LanguageData.RimatomicsMinimap: When enabled the mini map requires a TACS (Target Acquisition and Communication System) from the mod Rimatomics in order to function
LanguageData.CommsConsoleMap: When enabled the mini map requires a comms console in order to function
LanguageData.FreeMinimap: When enabled the mini map is free to use without requiring extra buildings
LanguageData.PinttoolTip: Ping a location on the map which other players can see in multiplayer
LanguageData.MapAnchorTip: Lock the minimap to its current size and location
LanguageData.SneakyFinderTip: Mark all things on the map that are of the same def as the current selection
